original_text: David gave his gifts to the officer who took care of the army's food. Then he ran to the place where the Israelite soldiers were standing. He said ‘hello’ to his brothers to see if they were well.
korean_text: 다윗이 자기의 짐을 짐 지키는 자의 손에 맡기고 군대로 달려가서 형들에게 문안하고

sentences.original_text: David gave his gifts to the officer
who took care of the army's food
Then he ran to the place
where the Israelite soldiers were standing
to see if they were well
